replies.body:
You cannot change your forum avatar to anything besides your default minecraft face or gravatar. For example, I uploaded this image to my gravatar account (the one linked to my forums account) and made is G-rated, selected Gravatar on the edit-profile page and saved my changes.
I don't see why you can't just upload a photo/image to the gravatar website...

.
